span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 嵌入： to enclose closely in or as if in a matrix
【例】 The thorn刺 was embedded in her thumb拇指.
【近】 entrench, fix, ingrain, root
【反】 extract 取出；dislodge, uproot 移出
【派】 embedded adj. 嵌入式的
【记】 em + bed 到床上，就好象陷在床上般，因为床软(席梦思)；着床，胚胎着床就是植入的
Having half-baked knowledge is worse than knowing nothing at all. 一知半解 ,不如不知不解。
